name: AS_CO_DSP_progressBarField
description: Generic Progress bar field to display the progress
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_progressBarField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    percentage: ri!percentage,
    style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!style,
      replacementValue: "THICK"
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    color: ri!color
  )
